$interpreted: Nolva: M-Monster!
Nolva: H...How long have you been inside my body!?
Nolva: When I was asleep and not conscious, did you use my body to do terrible things?
Nolva: Who, just who exactly are you...
Nolva: N-No good!
Nolva: ...I'm feeling sleepy again..why does it have to be now...
Nolva: ......
Nolva: ... Eh?
Nolva: Wha...What in the world is going on?
Nolva: WHO ARE YOU!?
Nolva: Y-You look exactly like me...
？？？: What you are seeing right now is your physical form.
Nolva: My physical...form...?
Nolva: You...just who in the world are you?
？？？: Ho...ho...we've been together for so long...
？？？: Yet you still don't know who I am?
Nolva: M-Monster...you're that monster?
Nolva: So you can talk!?
Monster: We shouldn't be able to communicate with each other.
Monster: However, due to the dangerous situation back there, a small part of our consciousness seems to be connected now.
Nolva: W,-Why is my body transparent?
Monster: Right now, you are existing as an ethereal form of your mind. In reality, we still share the same physical presence.
Nolva: You...you took control of my body?
Monster: ......
Nolva: Then...you were trying to help me back there?
Nolva: T-Thank you...
Monster: No need to thank me. After all, I made a promise to that old man.
Nolva: S-So grandpa knew about this as well?
Nolva: Then...exactly how long have you been inside my body?
Monster: Ever since you were a baby, I believe? It's tough for me as well. I was stuck inside you, unable to escape.
Monster: I had to wait until you're asleep before I could control your body to move around. I can do this~
Nolva: That's enough! Please stop!
Nolva: Ah, right. The old man you just mentioned; was that grandpa? What did you promise him?
Monster: I used to be really~ evil. Whenever you fell asleep, I would take over your body as fast as possible.
Monster: I did that because I was trying to meet up with other monsters to cause trouble together.
Nolva: You used to be...so grandpa knew all along?
Monster: That old man... he did a lot of things for you without you ever knowing it.
Monster: There are some things I would like you to know, as well as the painstaking efforts of that old man.
Nolva: Grandpa's efforts...
Monster: I have the ability to switch memories with you. That way, I can temporarily recreate images of the past.
Nolva: The past?
Monster: Are you prepared?
Nolva: Yes.
Nolva: W,-What is happening?
Nolva: This...isn't this the civilian district I used to live in?
Nolva: What are we doing here?
Monster: This is the thing I wanted to show you.
Nolva: Grandpa!?
Grandpa: Stinkin' monster, I will not let you do bad things with Nolva's body!
Grandpa: Are...are you alright?
Grandpa: You wretched monster!
Monster: Whenever I took over your body, the old man would get in my way and stop me like this. I wasn't able to cause any harm because of his actions.
Monster: He and I went back-and-forth like this for a good thirty-plus years~
Nolva: Grandpa has been doing all this for the past thirty years without me knowing about it? Why didn't he just tell me?
Monster: The old man even paid extra attention to not harm your body while he was fighting me. Hehe...it was not easy dealing with him.
Monster: You humans are, truly, foolish creatures...
Nolva: Gr...Grandpa...
Monster: Ooh, this is a good one. I pretended to not take control of you in an attempt to fool the old man. I waited until he's asleep before I snuck out, but...
Grandpa: Stinkin' monster, you fell for my trap!
Grandpa: Hehe, didn't think that I would pretend to fall asleep to fool you, did ya~
Grandpa: Nolva is already really self-abased because of her sleeping disease.
Grandpa: If I let you do bad things with her body, she won't be able to forgive herself, ever! So I must to stop you right here!
Nolva: Grandpa...he was worried about how I felt. That's why he never told me anything and shouldered everything for me, all by himself...
Monster: My ability is about to reach its limit. Time for you to see the climax.
Monster: This is the last thing I will show you.
Grandpa: ...*huff*...*puff*...don't run...stop...
Grandpa: ...*huff*...hehe, So you care about me? To be honest, after all these years of fighting you, I've come to realize that you're not that evil by nature.
Grandpa: Or perhaps you've been affected by Nolva's kind nature?
Grandpa: I can no longer catch up with you...has my time finally arrived? Been expecting this day to come, but I still can't let go of Nolva...
Grandpa: ...Will you listen to an old man mumble for a moment?

Grandpa: For the sake of the body you're sharing with her, 
please take care of Nolva for me, ok?
Grandpa: I know it sounds absurd asking a monster such a favor, but you're the only one I can ask...

Monster: Hmph, I couldn't care less about that request. However, at that time, for some unknown reason, I just couldn't...
Maybe it was because this old man was all I had by my side for the past thirty years...
Grandpa: Thank you...my biggest regret was that I failed to let Nolva open her heart and make some good friends; ones that you can truly trust.
Grandpa: People can't, and shouldn't, live in this world alone. You need friends to help each other out. This is the last thing I wanted to teach Nolva...
Nolva: Grandpa!
Grandpa: I'll leave Nolva...
Grandpa: ...to you then...
Grandpa: Hey stinkin' monster!
Grandpa: Thank you.
Grandpa: Thank you...for everything...
Nolva: Grandpa...Grandpa!!!
Monster: After saying this, the old man passed away the following day...
Monster: At the time, I really wanted to wake you up so you can see him one last time. However, that doesn't seem to be something I can do...
Nolva: ...*sob*... *sob*...
Monster: Let's go.
Nolva: *...sob*... Grandpa, grandpa...

Model.Text: M-Monster!
H...How long have you been inside my body!?
When I was asleep and not conscious, did you use my body to do terrible things?
Who, just who exactly are you...
N-No good!
...I'm feeling sleepy again..why does it have to be now...
Wha...What in the world is going on?
WHO ARE YOU!?
Y-You look exactly like me...
What you are seeing right now is your physical form.
My physical...form...?
You...just who in the world are you?
Ho...ho...we've been together for so long...
Yet you still don't know who I am?
M-Monster...you're that monster?
So you can talk!?
We shouldn't be able to communicate with each other.
However, due to the dangerous situation back there, a small part of our consciousness seems to be connected now.
W,-Why is my body transparent?
Right now, you are existing as an ethereal form of your mind. In reality, we still share the same physical presence.
You...you took control of my body?
Then...you were trying to help me back there?
T-Thank you...
No need to thank me. After all, I made a promise to that old man.
S-So grandpa knew about this as well?
Then...exactly how long have you been inside my body?
Ever since you were a baby, I believe? It's tough for me as well. I was stuck inside you, unable to escape.
I had to wait until you're asleep before I could control your body to move around. I can do this~
That's enough! Please stop!
Ah, right. The old man you just mentioned; was that grandpa? What did you promise him?
I used to be really~ evil. Whenever you fell asleep, I would take over your body as fast as possible.
I did that because I was trying to meet up with other monsters to cause trouble together.
You used to be...so grandpa knew all along?
That old man... he did a lot of things for you without you ever knowing it.
There are some things I would like you to know, as well as the painstaking efforts of that old man.
Grandpa's efforts...
I have the ability to switch memories with you. That way, I can temporarily recreate images of the past.
The past?
Are you prepared?
Yes.
W,-What is happening?
This...isn't this the civilian district I used to live in?
What are we doing here?
This is the thing I wanted to show you.
Grandpa!?
Stinkin' monster, I will not let you do bad things with Nolva's body!
Are...are you alright?
You wretched monster!
Whenever I took over your body, the old man would get in my way and stop me like this. I wasn't able to cause any harm because of his actions.
He and I went back-and-forth like this for a good thirty-plus years~
Grandpa has been doing all this for the past thirty years without me knowing about it? Why didn't he just tell me?
The old man even paid extra attention to not harm your body while he was fighting me. Hehe...it was not easy dealing with him.
You humans are, truly, foolish creatures...
Gr...Grandpa...
Ooh, this is a good one. I pretended to not take control of you in an attempt to fool the old man. I waited until he's asleep before I snuck out, but...
Stinkin' monster, you fell for my trap!
Hehe, didn't think that I would pretend to fall asleep to fool you, did ya~
Nolva is already really self-abased because of her sleeping disease.
If I let you do bad things with her body, she won't be able to forgive herself, ever! So I must to stop you right here!
Grandpa...he was worried about how I felt. That's why he never told me anything and shouldered everything for me, all by himself...
My ability is about to reach its limit. Time for you to see the climax.
This is the last thing I will show you.
...*huff*...*puff*...don't run...stop...
...*huff*...hehe, So you care about me? To be honest, after all these years of fighting you, I've come to realize that you're not that evil by nature.
Or perhaps you've been affected by Nolva's kind nature?
I can no longer catch up with you...has my time finally arrived? Been expecting this day to come, but I still can't let go of Nolva...
...Will you listen to an old man mumble for a moment?

For the sake of the body you're sharing with her, 
please take care of Nolva for me, ok?
I know it sounds absurd asking a monster such a favor, but you're the only one I can ask...

Hmph, I couldn't care less about that request. However, at that time, for some unknown reason, I just couldn't...
Maybe it was because this old man was all I had by my side for the past thirty years...
Thank you...my biggest regret was that I failed to let Nolva open her heart and make some good friends; ones that you can truly trust.
People can't, and shouldn't, live in this world alone. You need friends to help each other out. This is the last thing I wanted to teach Nolva...
Grandpa!
I'll leave Nolva...
...to you then...
Hey stinkin' monster!
Thank you.
Thank you...for everything...
Grandpa...Grandpa!!!
After saying this, the old man passed away the following day...
At the time, I really wanted to wake you up so you can see him one last time. However, that doesn't seem to be something I can do...
Let's go.
*...sob*... Grandpa, grandpa...

I wasn't able to cause any harm because of his actions.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_12_001","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"He and I went back-and-forth like this for a good thirty-plus years~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_12_002","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Grandpa has been doing all this for the past thirty years without me knowing about it? Why didn't he just tell me?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_12_003","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The old man even paid extra attention to not harm your body while he was fighting me. Hehe...it was not easy dealing with him.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_12_004","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You humans are, truly, foolish creatures...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_12_005","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Gr...Grandpa...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_13_000","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ooh, this is a good one. I pretended to not take control of you in an attempt to fool the old man. I waited until he's asleep before I snuck out, but...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_13_001","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Stinkin' monster, you fell for my trap!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_14_000","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hehe, didn't think that I would pretend to fall asleep to fool you, did ya~","sfxName":"human_male_old_04","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_14_001","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Nolva is already really self-abased because of her sleeping disease. ","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_14_002","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If I let you do bad things with her body, she won't be able to forgive herself, ever! So I must to stop you right here!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_15_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Grandpa...he was worried about how I felt. That's why he never told me anything and shouldered everything for me, all by himself...","sfxName":"h0097_story_014","sfxVolume":0.1},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_15_001","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"My ability is about to reach its limit. Time for you to see the climax.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_15_002","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This is the last thing I will show you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...*huff*...*puff*...don't run...stop...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...*huff*...hehe, So you care about me? To be honest, after all these years of fighting you, I've come to realize that you're not that evil by nature.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Or perhaps you've been affected by Nolva's kind nature?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I can no longer catch up with you...has my time finally arrived? Been expecting this day to come, but I still can't let go of Nolva...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Will you listen to an old man mumble for a moment?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"For the sake of the body you're sharing with her, \nplease take care of Nolva for me, ok?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_18_003","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know it sounds absurd asking a monster such a favor, but you're the only one I can ask...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph, I couldn't care less about that request. However, at that time, for some unknown reason, I just couldn't...\nMaybe it was because this old man was all I had by my side for the past thirty years...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you...my biggest regret was that I failed to let Nolva open her heart and make some good friends; ones that you can truly trust.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"People can't, and shouldn't, live in this world alone. You need friends to help each other out. This is the last thing I wanted to teach Nolva...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Grandpa!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_20_003","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'll leave Nolva...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_20_004","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...to you then...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_20_005","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hey stinkin' monster!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_20_006","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_20_007","SpeakerName":"Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0131c2","IconName":"h0131c2_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you...for everything... ","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Grandpa...Grandpa!!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"After saying this, the old man passed away the following day...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"At the time, I really wanted to wake you up so you can see him one last time. However, that doesn't seem to be something I can do...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_21_003","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...*sob*... *sob*...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_21_004","SpeakerName":"Monster","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Let's go.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0097_005_dialog_english##_21_005","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"*...sob*... Grandpa, grandpa...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
